column5: I thought if I was going through the effort of digging up some old pictures of Quantz Lake, I'd post them here in case anyone else was interested  the anticipation and planning of a trip is half the fun, I can tell he's already excited    we had to fly right through a rain cloud, the only cloud in the sky, but it was right over Quantz    Mr Simon, get ready for lots of this      cabin/ camp pics            here's an odd pic I came across, I went swimming and must have picked up a leech, Hahaha
Decent looking cabin.  Thanks for posting those.  I always like to see what the outposts look like.  Quantz has been on my radar for a while.  Hopefully I will get up there one day.

Thanks!  Nothing like getting excited for a trip that is over a year away  I'm assuming you took in your own axe?  And it looks like the seating situation is pretty limited .... we can take in camp chairs - shouldn't be too heavy.  That leech is gross.  I don't think I would have been so easy going about it as you.

I was going to suggest you contact Chris through OFC when you switched from Wanzatika to Quantz. You're way ahead of me! By all accounts you picked a good one.  (99.9% sure Hearst will have an axe at all of their outposts)
Awesome and way to catch your own bait too!
